00034 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest );

00040 #define TEST_FILE1 "multi_data_file1"
00041 #define TEST_FILE2a "multi_data_file2a"
00042 #define TEST_FILE2b "multi_data_file2b"
00043 #define TEST_FILE3a "multi_data_file3a"
00044 #define TEST_FILE3b "multi_data_file3b"
00045 #define DMET_TEST_FILE "dmet_multi_data"

00047 static string IntToString(int i)
00048 {
00049    char buf[64];
00050    sprintf(buf, "%d", i);
00051    return buf;
00052 }

00062 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::CreateReferenceFile1()
00063 {
00064         int ng = 10000;
00065         int nx = 5000;
00066         CHPMultiDataData data(TEST_FILE1);
00067         data.SetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType, ng, 10);
00068         data.SetEntryCount(ExpressionMultiDataType, nx, 10);
00069         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
00070         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00071         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00072 
00073         writer->SeekToDataSet(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00074         gn.call = 0;
00075         gn.confidence = 0.0f;
00076         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++)
00077         {
00078                 gn.name = IntToString(i);
00079                 writer->WriteEntry(gn);
00080         }
00081         writer->SeekToDataSet(ExpressionMultiDataType);
00082         ex.quantification = 0;
00083         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00084         {
00085                 ex.name = IntToString(i);
00086                 writer->WriteEntry(ex);
00087         }
00088 
00089         delete writer;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::testBuffer1()
00093 {
00094         CreateReferenceFile1();
00095         UpdateFile1();
00096 
00097         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00098         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00099         CHPMultiDataData data;
00100         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
00101         reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE1);
00102         reader.Read(data);
00103 
00104         int ng = 10000;
00105         int nx = 5000;
00106 
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(ExpressionMultiDataType) == nx);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType) == ng);
00109 
00110         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00111         {
00112                 data.GetExpressionEntry(ExpressionMultiDataType, i, ex);
00113                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(ex.quantification, i, 0.0001f);
00114                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ex.name == IntToString(i));
00115         }
00116         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++)
00117         {
00118                 data.GetGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, i, gn);
00119                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gn.call == i%4);
00120                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(gn.confidence, i, 0.0001f);
00121                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gn.name == IntToString(i));
00122         }
00123 }
00124 
00125 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::UpdateFile1()
00126 {
00127         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
00128         vector<string> chps;
00129         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00130         map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLengths;
00131         dataTypes.push_back(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00132         dataTypes.push_back(ExpressionMultiDataType);
00133         chps.push_back(TEST_FILE1);
00134         maxNameLengths[GenotypeMultiDataType] = 10;
00135         maxNameLengths[ExpressionMultiDataType] = 10;
00136         writer.Initialize(&chps, dataTypes, maxNameLengths);
00137         writer.SetMaxBufferSize(102400);
00138         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00139         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00140 
00141         int ng = 10000;
00142         int nx = 5000;
00143 
00144         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00145         {
00146                 ex.quantification = (float)i;
00147                 ex.name = IntToString(i);
00148                 writer.WriteMultiDataExpressionEntry(ExpressionMultiDataType, 0, ex);
00149         }
00150         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++)
00151         {
00152                 gn.name = IntToString(i);
00153                 gn.call = i%4;
00154                 gn.confidence = (float) i;
00155                 writer.WriteMultiDataGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, 0, gn);
00156         }
00157         writer.FlushBuffer();
00158 }

00160 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::CreateReferenceFile2(const char *fileName, int offset)
00161 {
00162         vector<ColumnInfo> cols;
00163         ParameterNameValueType nv;
00164 
00165         IntColumn icol(L"int");
00166         cols.push_back(icol);
00167 
00168         FloatColumn fcol(L"float");
00169         cols.push_back(fcol);
00170 
00171         int ng = 10000;
00172         int nx = 5000;
00173         CHPMultiDataData data(fileName);
00174         data.SetEntryCount(ExpressionMultiDataType, nx, 10, cols);
00175         data.SetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType, ng, 10, cols);
00176         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
00177         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00178         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00179 
00180         nv.SetName(L"int");
00181         nv.SetValueInt32(0);
00182         ex.metrics.push_back(nv);
00183         gn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00184         nv.SetName(L"float");
00185         nv.SetValueFloat(0);
00186         ex.metrics.push_back(nv);
00187         gn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00188 
00189         writer->SeekToDataSet(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00190         gn.call = 0;
00191         gn.confidence = 0.0f;
00192         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++)
00193         {
00194                 gn.name = IntToString(i+offset);
00195                 writer->WriteEntry(gn);
00196         }
00197 
00198         writer->SeekToDataSet(ExpressionMultiDataType);
00199         ex.quantification = 0;
00200         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00201         {
00202                 ex.name = IntToString(i+offset);
00203                 writer->WriteEntry(ex);
00204         }
00205         delete writer;
00206 }

00208 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::testBuffer2()
00209 {
00210         CreateReferenceFile2(TEST_FILE2a, 0);
00211         CreateReferenceFile2(TEST_FILE2b, 1001);
00212         vector<string> chps;
00213         vector<int> offset;
00214         chps.push_back(TEST_FILE2a);
00215         offset.push_back(0);
00216         chps.push_back(TEST_FILE2b);
00217         offset.push_back(1001);
00218         UpdateFile2(chps, offset);
00219         CheckFile2(TEST_FILE2a, 0);
00220         CheckFile2(TEST_FILE2b, 1001);
00221 }
00222 
00223 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::CheckFile2(const char *fileName, int offset)
00224 {
00225         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00226         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00227         CHPMultiDataData data;
00228         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
00229         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00230         reader.Read(data);
00231 
00232         int ng = 10000;
00233         int nx = 5000;
00234 
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(ExpressionMultiDataType) == nx);
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType) == ng);
00237 
00238         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00239         {
00240                 data.GetExpressionEntry(ExpressionMultiDataType, i, ex);
00241                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(ex.quantification, i+offset, 0.0001f);
00242                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ex.name == IntToString(i+offset));
00243 
00244                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ex.metrics[0].GetValueInt32() == i+offset);
00245                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(ex.metrics[1].GetValueFloat(), 2*i+offset, 0.00001f);
00246         }
00247         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++)
00248         {
00249                 data.GetGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, i, gn);
00250                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gn.call == (i+offset)%4);
00251                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(gn.confidence, i+offset, 0.0001f);
00252                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gn.name == IntToString(i+offset));
00253 
00254                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gn.metrics[0].GetValueInt32() == i+offset);
00255                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(gn.metrics[1].GetValueFloat(), 2*i+offset, 0.00001f);
00256         }
00257 }
00258 
00259 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::UpdateFile2(std::vector<std::string> &fileNames, vector<int> offset)
00260 {
00261         ParameterNameValueType nv;
00262         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
00263         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00264         dataTypes.push_back(ExpressionMultiDataType);
00265         dataTypes.push_back(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00266         map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLengths;
00267         maxNameLengths[ExpressionMultiDataType]=10;
00268         maxNameLengths[GenotypeMultiDataType]=10;
00269         writer.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxNameLengths);
00270         writer.SetMaxBufferSize(102400);
00271 
00272         int ng = 10000;
00273         int nx = 5000;
00274 
00275         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00276         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00277 
00278         nv.SetName(L"int");
00279         nv.SetValueInt32(0);
00280         ex.metrics.push_back(nv);
00281         gn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00282         nv.SetName(L"float");
00283         nv.SetValueFloat(0);
00284         ex.metrics.push_back(nv);
00285         gn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00286         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00287         {
00288                 for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)fileNames.size(); ifile++)
00289                 {
00290                         ex.name = IntToString(i+offset[ifile]);
00291                         ex.quantification = (float)(i+offset[ifile]);
00292                         ex.metrics[0].SetValueInt32(i+offset[ifile]);
00293                         ex.metrics[1].SetValueFloat(2.0f*i+offset[ifile]);
00294                         writer.WriteMultiDataExpressionEntry(ExpressionMultiDataType, ifile, ex);
00295                 }
00296         }
00297 
00298         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++)
00299         {
00300                 for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)fileNames.size(); ifile++)
00301                 {
00302                         gn.name = IntToString(i+offset[ifile]);
00303                         gn.call = (i+offset[ifile])%4;
00304                         gn.confidence = (float)(i+offset[ifile]);
00305                         gn.metrics[0].SetValueInt32(i+offset[ifile]);
00306                         gn.metrics[1].SetValueFloat(2.0f*i+offset[ifile]);
00307                         writer.WriteMultiDataGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, ifile, gn);
00308                 }
00309         }
00310         writer.FlushBuffer();
00311 }
00312 
00313 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::CreateReferenceFile3(const char *fileName, int offset)
00314 {
00315         vector<ColumnInfo> cols;
00316         ParameterNameValueType nv;
00317 
00318         IntColumn icol(L"int");
00319         cols.push_back(icol);
00320 
00321         FloatColumn fcol(L"float");
00322         cols.push_back(fcol);
00323 
00324         int ng = 10000;
00325         int nc = 10000;
00326         int nx = 5000;
00327         CHPMultiDataData data(fileName);
00328         data.SetEntryCount(ExpressionMultiDataType, nx, 10, cols);
00329         data.SetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType, ng, 10, cols);
00330         data.SetEntryCount(CopyNumberMultiDataType, nc, 10, cols);
00331         data.SetEntryCount(CytoMultiDataType, nc, 10);
00332         data.SetEntryCount(CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType, nx, 10, cols);
00333 
00334         DataSetHeader *dsh = data.GetDataSetHeader(CopyNumberMultiDataType);
00335         for (int i=0; i<5; ++i)
00336         {
00337                 ParameterNameValueType param;
00338                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(IntToString(i)));
00339                 param.SetValueAscii(IntToString(i));
00340                 dsh->AddNameValParam(param);
00341         }
00342 
00343         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
00344         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00345         ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberData cn;
00346         ProbeSetMultiDataCytoRegionData cy;
00347         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00348         ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberVariationRegionData cv;
00349 
00350         nv.SetName(L"int");
00351         nv.SetValueInt32(0);
00352         ex.metrics.push_back(nv);
00353         gn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00354         cv.metrics.push_back(nv);
00355         nv.SetName(L"float");
00356         nv.SetValueFloat(0);
00357         ex.metrics.push_back(nv);
00358         gn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00359         cv.metrics.push_back(nv);
00360 
00361         writer->SeekToDataSet(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00362         gn.call = 0;
00363         gn.confidence = 0.0f;
00364         writer->SeekToDataSet(CopyNumberMultiDataType);
00365         cn.chr = 0;
00366         cn.position = 0;
00367         writer->SeekToDataSet(CytoMultiDataType);
00368         cy.call = 0;
00369         cy.confidenceScore = 0;
00370         cy.chr = 0;
00371         cy.startPosition = 0;
00372         cy.stopPosition = 0;
00373         writer->SeekToDataSet(ExpressionMultiDataType);
00374         ex.quantification = 0;
00375         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00376         {
00377                 ex.name = IntToString(i+offset);
00378                 writer->WriteEntry(ex);
00379         }
00380 
00381         writer->SeekToDataSet(CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType);
00382         cv.call = 0;
00383         cv.confidenceScore = 0.0f;
00384         cv.signal = 0.0f;    
00385         delete writer;
00386 }

00388 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::testBuffer3()
00389 {
00390         CreateReferenceFile3(TEST_FILE3a, 0);
00391         CreateReferenceFile3(TEST_FILE3b, 1001);
00392         vector<string> chps;
00393         vector<int> offset;
00394         chps.push_back(TEST_FILE3a);
00395         offset.push_back(0);
00396         chps.push_back(TEST_FILE3b);
00397         offset.push_back(1001);
00398         UpdateFile3(chps, offset);
00399         CheckFile3(TEST_FILE3a, 0);
00400         CheckFile3(TEST_FILE3b, 1001);
00401 }
00402 
00403 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::CheckFile3(const char *fileName, int offset)
00404 {
00405         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00406         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00407         ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberData cn;
00408         ProbeSetMultiDataCytoRegionData cy;
00409         ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberVariationRegionData cv;
00410         CHPMultiDataData data;
00411         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
00412         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00413         reader.Read(data);
00414 
00415         int ng = 10000;
00416         int nc = 10000;
00417         int nx = 5000;
00418 
00419         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(ExpressionMultiDataType) == nx);
00420         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType) == ng);
00421         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(CopyNumberMultiDataType) == nc);
00422         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(CytoMultiDataType) == nc);
00423         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType) == nx);
00424 
00425         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00426         {
00427                 data.GetExpressionEntry(ExpressionMultiDataType, i, ex);
00428                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(ex.quantification, i+offset, 0.0001f);
00429                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ex.name == IntToString(i+offset));
00430 
00431                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ex.metrics[0].GetValueInt32() == i+offset);
00432                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(ex.metrics[1].GetValueFloat(), 2*i+offset, 0.00001f);
00433         }
00434         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++)
00435         {
00436                 data.GetGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, i, gn);
00437                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gn.call == (i+offset)%4);
00438                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(gn.confidence, i+offset, 0.0001f);
00439                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gn.name == IntToString(i+offset));
00440 
00441                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gn.metrics[0].GetValueInt32() == i+offset);
00442                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(gn.metrics[1].GetValueFloat(), 2*i+offset, 0.00001f);
00443         }
00444         for (int i=0; i<nc; i++)
00445         {
00446                 data.GetCopyNumberEntry(CopyNumberMultiDataType, i, cn);
00447                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cn.chr == (i+offset)%4);
00448                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cn.position == i+offset);
00449                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cn.name == IntToString(i+offset));
00450 
00451                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cn.metrics[0].GetValueInt32() == i+offset);
00452                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(cn.metrics[1].GetValueFloat(), 2*i+offset, 0.00001f);
00453         }
00454         for (int i=0; i<nc; i++)
00455         {
00456                 data.GetCytoEntry(CytoMultiDataType, i, cy);
00457                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cy.call == (i+offset)%4);
00458                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cy.chr == (i+offset)%10);
00459                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cy.startPosition == i);
00460                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cy.stopPosition == i+1);
00461                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(cy.confidenceScore, i+offset, 0.00001f);
00462                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cy.name == IntToString(i+offset));
00463         }
00464         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00465         {
00466                 data.GetCopyNumberVariationEntry(CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType, i, cv);
00467                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(cv.confidenceScore, i+offset, 0.00001f);
00468                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(cv.signal, i+offset, 0.00001f);
00469                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cv.call == (i+offset)%4);
00470                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cv.name == IntToString(i+offset));
00471         }
00472 }
00473 
00474 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::UpdateFile3(std::vector<std::string> &fileNames, vector<int> offset)
00475 {
00476         ParameterNameValueType nv;
00477         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
00478         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00479         dataTypes.push_back(ExpressionMultiDataType);
00480         dataTypes.push_back(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00481         dataTypes.push_back(CopyNumberMultiDataType);
00482         dataTypes.push_back(CytoMultiDataType);
00483         dataTypes.push_back(CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType);
00484         map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLengths;
00485         maxNameLengths[ExpressionMultiDataType]=10;
00486         maxNameLengths[GenotypeMultiDataType]=10;
00487         maxNameLengths[CopyNumberMultiDataType]=10;
00488         maxNameLengths[CytoMultiDataType]=10;
00489         maxNameLengths[CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType]=10;
00490         writer.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxNameLengths);
00491         writer.SetMaxBufferSize(102400);
00492 
00493         int ng = 10000;
00494         int nc = 10000;
00495         int nx = 5000;
00496 
00497         ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData ex;
00498         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData gn;
00499         ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberData cn;
00500         ProbeSetMultiDataCytoRegionData cy;
00501         ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberVariationRegionData cv;
00502 
00503         nv.SetName(L"int");
00504         nv.SetValueInt32(0);
00505         ex.metrics.push_back(nv);
00506         gn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00507         cn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00508         cv.metrics.push_back(nv);
00509         nv.SetName(L"float");
00510         nv.SetValueFloat(0);
00511         ex.metrics.push_back(nv);
00512         gn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00513         cn.metrics.push_back(nv);
00514         cv.metrics.push_back(nv);
00515 
00516         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00517         {
00518                 for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)fileNames.size(); ifile++)
00519                 {
00520                         ex.name = IntToString(i+offset[ifile]);
00521                         ex.quantification = (float)(i+offset[ifile]);
00522                         ex.metrics[0].SetValueInt32(i+offset[ifile]);
00523                         ex.metrics[1].SetValueFloat(2.0f*i+offset[ifile]);
00524                         writer.WriteMultiDataExpressionEntry(ExpressionMultiDataType, ifile, ex);
00525                 }
00526         }
00527 
00528         for (int i=0; i<ng; i++)
00529         {
00530                 for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)fileNames.size(); ifile++)
00531                 {
00532                         gn.name = IntToString(i+offset[ifile]);
00533                         gn.call = (i+offset[ifile])%4;
00534                         gn.confidence = (float)(i+offset[ifile]);
00535                         gn.metrics[0].SetValueInt32(i+offset[ifile]);
00536                         gn.metrics[1].SetValueFloat(2.0f*i+offset[ifile]);
00537                         writer.WriteMultiDataGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, ifile, gn);
00538                 }
00539         }
00540         for (int i=0; i<nc; i++)
00541         {
00542                 for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)fileNames.size(); ifile++)
00543                 {
00544                         cn.name = IntToString(i+offset[ifile]);
00545                         cn.chr = ((i+offset[ifile])%4);
00546                         cn.position = (i+offset[ifile]);
00547                         cn.metrics[0].SetValueInt32(i+offset[ifile]);
00548                         cn.metrics[1].SetValueFloat(2.0f*i+offset[ifile]);
00549                         writer.WriteMultiDataCopyNumberEntry(CopyNumberMultiDataType, ifile, cn);
00550                 }
00551         }
00552         for (int i=0; i<nc; i++)
00553         {
00554                 for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)fileNames.size(); ifile++)
00555                 {
00556                         cy.name = IntToString(i+offset[ifile]);
00557                         cy.call = ((i+offset[ifile])%4);
00558                         cy.chr = ((i+offset[ifile])%10);
00559                         cy.startPosition = i;
00560                         cy.stopPosition = i+1;
00561                         cy.confidenceScore = (float)(i+offset[ifile]);
00562                         writer.WriteMultiDataCytoRegionEntry(CytoMultiDataType, ifile, cy);
00563                 }
00564         }
00565 
00566         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00567         {
00568                 for (int ifile=0; ifile<(int)fileNames.size(); ifile++)
00569                 {
00570                         cv.name = IntToString(i+offset[ifile]);
00571                         cv.signal = (float)(i+offset[ifile]);
00572                         cv.call = ((i+offset[ifile])%4);
00573                         cv.confidenceScore = (float)(i+offset[ifile]);
00574                         cv.metrics[0].SetValueInt32(i+offset[ifile]);
00575                         cv.metrics[1].SetValueFloat(2.0f*i+offset[ifile]);
00576                         writer.WriteMultiDataCopyNumberVariationRegionEntry(CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType,
00577                                 ifile, cv);
00578                 }
00579         }
00580         writer.FlushBuffer(); 
00581 }
00582 
00583 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::testDMET()
00584 {
00585         CreateDmetReferenceFile();
00586         UpdateDmetFile();
00587 
00588         CHPMultiDataData data;
00589         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
00590         reader.SetFilename(DMET_TEST_FILE);
00591         reader.Read(data);
00592 
00593         int gRows = 100;
00594         int cRows = 50;
00595         int mRows = 20;
00596 
00597         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType) == gRows);
00598         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType) == cRows);
00599         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount(DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType) == mRows);
00600 
00601         DmetBiAllelicData gData;
00602         for (int i = 0; i < gRows; i++)
00603         {
00604                 data.GetEntry(DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType, i, gData);
00605                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(gData.confidence, i, 0.0001f);
00606                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.name == IntToString(i));
00607         }
00608         DmetCopyNumberData cData;
00609         for (int i = 0; i < cRows; i++)
00610         {
00611                 data.GetEntry(DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType, i, cData);
00612                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cData.call == i%4);
00613                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(cData.confidence, i, 0.0001f);
00614                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cData.name == IntToString(i));
00615         }
00616         DmetMultiAllelicData mData;
00617         for (int i = 0; i < mRows; i++)
00618         {
00619                 data.GetEntry(DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType, i, mData);
00620                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mData.call == i%4);
00621                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(mData.confidence, i, 0.0001f);
00622                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mData.name == IntToString(i));
00623         }
00624     
00625 }

00627 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::CreateDmetReferenceFile()
00628 {
00629         int gRows = 100;
00630         int cRows = 50;
00631         int mRows = 20;
00632         CHPMultiDataData data(DMET_TEST_FILE);
00633         data.SetEntryCount(DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType, gRows, 10);
00634         data.SetEntryCount(DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType, cRows, 10);
00635         data.SetEntryCount(DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType, mRows, 10);
00636         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
00637         DmetBiAllelicData gData;
00638         writer->SeekToDataSet(DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType);
00639         gData.call = 22;
00640         gData.confidence = 1.1f;
00641         gData.force = 22;
00642         gData.signalA = 22;
00643         gData.signalB = 22;
00644         gData.contextA = 22;
00645         gData.contextB = 22;
00646         for (int i = 0; i < gRows; i++)
00647         {
00648                 gData.name = IntToString(i);
00649                 writer->WriteEntry(gData);
00650         }
00651         DmetCopyNumberData cData;
00652         writer->SeekToDataSet(DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType);
00653         cData.call = 33;
00654         cData.confidence = 33.3f;
00655         cData.force = 99;
00656         cData.estimate = 66.6f;
00657         cData.lower = 44.4f;
00658         cData.upper = 55.5f;
00659         for (int i = 0; i < cRows; i++)
00660         {
00661                 cData.name = IntToString(i);
00662                 writer->WriteEntry(cData);
00663         }
00664         DmetMultiAllelicData mData;
00665         writer->SeekToDataSet(DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType);
00666         mData.call = 22;
00667         mData.confidence = 77.7f;
00668         mData.force = 55;
00669         mData.alleleCount = 0;
00670         mData.signalA = 0;
00671         mData.signalB = 0;
00672         mData.signalC = 0;
00673         mData.signalD = 0;
00674         mData.signalE = 0;
00675         mData.signalF = 0;
00676         mData.contextA = 0;
00677         mData.contextB = 0;
00678         mData.contextC = 0;
00679         mData.contextD = 0;
00680         mData.contextE = 0;
00681         mData.contextF = 0;
00682         for (int i = 0; i < mRows; i++)
00683         {
00684                 mData.name = IntToString(i);
00685                 writer->WriteEntry(mData);
00686         }
00687         delete writer;
00688 }
00689 
00690 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::UpdateDmetFile()
00691 {
00692         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
00693         vector<string> chps;
00694         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00695         map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLengths;
00696         dataTypes.push_back(DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType);
00697         dataTypes.push_back(DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType);
00698         dataTypes.push_back(DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType);
00699         chps.push_back(DMET_TEST_FILE);
00700         maxNameLengths[DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType] = 10;
00701         maxNameLengths[DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType] = 10;
00702         maxNameLengths[DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType] = 10;
00703         writer.Initialize(&chps, dataTypes, maxNameLengths);
00704         writer.SetMaxBufferSize(102400);
00705 
00706         DmetBiAllelicData gData;
00707         int gRows = 100;
00708         for (int i = 0; i < gRows; i++)
00709         {
00710                 gData.call = 22;
00711                 gData.confidence = (float)i;
00712                 gData.force = 22;
00713                 gData.signalA = 22;
00714                 gData.signalB = 22;
00715                 gData.contextA = 22;
00716                 gData.contextB = 22;
00717                 gData.name = IntToString(i);
00718                 writer.WriteEntry(DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType, 0, gData);
00719         }
00720         DmetCopyNumberData cData;
00721         int cRows = 50;
00722         for (int i = 0; i < cRows; i++)
00723         {
00724                 cData.name = IntToString(i);
00725                 cData.call = i%4;
00726                 cData.confidence = (float)i;
00727                 cData.force = 99;
00728                 cData.estimate = 66.6f;
00729                 cData.lower = 44.4f;
00730                 cData.upper = 55.5f;
00731                 writer.WriteEntry(DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType, 0, cData);
00732         }
00733 
00734         DmetMultiAllelicData mData;
00735         int mRows = 20;
00736         for (int i = 0; i < mRows; i++)
00737         {
00738                 mData.name = IntToString(i);
00739                 mData.call = i%4;
00740                 mData.confidence = (float)i;
00741                 mData.force = 55;
00742                 mData.alleleCount = 0;
00743                 mData.signalA = 0;
00744                 mData.signalB = 0;
00745                 mData.signalC = 0;
00746                 mData.signalD = 0;
00747                 mData.signalE = 0;
00748                 mData.signalF = 0;
00749                 mData.contextA = 0;
00750                 mData.contextB = 0;
00751                 mData.contextC = 0;
00752                 mData.contextD = 0;
00753                 mData.contextE = 0;
00754                 mData.contextF = 0;
00755                 writer.WriteEntry(DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType, 0, mData);
00756         }
00757         writer.FlushBuffer();
00758 }

00760 static void CreateChrSumFile(const char *file)
00761 {
00762     std::list<std::wstring> groupNames;
00763     groupNames.push_back(L"g1");
00764         CHPMultiDataData data(file, &groupNames);
00765         data.SetAlgName(L"sig");
00766         data.SetAlgVersion(L"1.0");
00767         data.SetArrayType(L"test3");
00768         data.SetEntryCount(ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType, 3, 10, L"g1");
00769         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
00770     delete writer;
00771 }
00772 
00773 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::WriteTestChrSummary()
00774 {
00775     CreateChrSumFile("chrsum1");
00776     CreateChrSumFile("chrsum2");
00777     affymetrix_calvin_data::ChromosomeMultiDataSummaryData p;
00778 
00779     CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
00780         vector<string> chps;
00781         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00782 
00783     chps.push_back("chrsum1");
00784         chps.push_back("chrsum2");
00785         dataTypes.push_back(ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType);
00786 
00787     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLn;
00788     maxNameLn[ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType] = 10;
00789 
00790     writer.Initialize(&chps, dataTypes, maxNameLn);
00791     float fval = 1.0f;
00792         //char buf[16];
00793     for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
00794     {
00795         p.chr=i;
00796                 p.display=IntToString(i);
00797                 p.startIndex=(u_int32_t)fval++;
00798                 p.markerCount=(u_int32_t)fval++;
00799         p.minSignal=fval++;
00800         p.maxSignal=fval++;
00801         p.medianCnState=fval++;
00802         p.homFrequency=fval++;
00803         p.hetFrequency=fval++;
00804         //p.mosaicism=fval++;
00805         writer.WriteEntry(ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType, 0, p);
00806         p.chr=i+1;
00807                 p.display=IntToString(i+1);
00808                 p.startIndex=(u_int32_t)fval++;
00809                 p.markerCount=(u_int32_t)fval++;
00810         p.minSignal=fval++;
00811         p.maxSignal=fval++;
00812         p.medianCnState=fval++;
00813         p.homFrequency=fval++;
00814         p.hetFrequency=fval++;
00815         //p.mosaicism=fval++;
00816         writer.WriteEntry(ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType, 1, p);
00817     }
00818     writer.FlushBuffer();
00819 
00820 
00821 
00822     fval = 1.0f;
00823         CHPMultiDataData data2;
00824         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
00825         reader.SetFilename("chrsum2");
00826         reader.Read(data2);
00827 
00828         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
00829         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00830         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
00831         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType) == 3);
00832 
00833     for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
00834     {
00835         fval += 7;
00836         data2.GetChromosomeSummaryEntry(ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType, i, p);
00837             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.chr == i+1);
00838             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(strcmp(p.display.c_str(), IntToString(i+1).c_str()) == 0);
00839                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.startIndex == (u_int32_t)fval++);
00840                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.markerCount == (u_int32_t)fval++);
00841             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.minSignal, fval++, 0.0001f);
00842             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.maxSignal, fval++, 0.0001f);
00843             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.medianCnState, fval++, 0.0001f);
00844             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.homFrequency, fval++, 0.0001f);
00845             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.hetFrequency, fval++, 0.0001f);
00846             //CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.mosaicism, fval++, 0.0001f);
00847     }
00848 }

00850 static void CreateChrSegFileEx(const char *file)
00851 {
00852     std::list<std::wstring> groupNames;
00853     groupNames.push_back(L"g1");
00854     groupNames.push_back(L"g2");
00855 
00856         CHPMultiDataData data(file, &groupNames);
00857 
00858         ParameterNameValueType param;
00859 
00860     vector<ColumnInfo> cols;
00861     IntColumn icol(L"int");
00862     cols.push_back(icol);
00863     FloatColumn fcol(L"float");
00864     cols.push_back(fcol);
00865 
00866         data.SetAlgName(L"sig");
00867         data.SetAlgVersion(L"1.0");
00868         data.SetArrayType(L"test3");
00869 
00870     const MultiDataType dataTypes[] = {
00871         SegmentGenotypeConcordanceMultiDataType,
00872         SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType,
00873         SegmentCNLossLOHConcordanceMultiDataType,
00874         SegmentCNNeutralLOHConcordanceMultiDataType,
00875         SegmentHeteroUPDMultiDataType,
00876         SegmentIsoUPDMultiDataType,
00877         SegmentDenovoCopyNumberMultiDataType,
00878         SegmentHemizygousParentOfOriginMultiDataType
00879     };
00880     int nTypes = sizeof(dataTypes) / sizeof(MultiDataType);
00881 
00882     for (int itype=0; itype<nTypes; itype++)
00883     {
00884         if (dataTypes[itype] == SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType)
00885             data.SetEntryCount(dataTypes[itype], 3+itype, 10, cols, L"g1");
00886         else
00887             data.SetEntryCount(dataTypes[itype], 3+itype, 10, L"g2");
00888     }
00889         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
00890     delete writer;
00891 }
00892 
00893 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::WriteTestChrSegmentEx()
00894 {
00895     CreateChrSegFileEx("chrseg1ex");
00896 
00897     affymetrix_calvin_data::ChromosomeSegmentDataEx p;
00898         ParameterNameValueType param;
00899     CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
00900         vector<string> chps;
00901         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypesV;
00902     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLn;
00903 
00904     const MultiDataType dataTypes[] = {
00905         SegmentGenotypeConcordanceMultiDataType,
00906         SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType,
00907         SegmentCNLossLOHConcordanceMultiDataType,
00908         SegmentCNNeutralLOHConcordanceMultiDataType,
00909         SegmentHeteroUPDMultiDataType,
00910         SegmentIsoUPDMultiDataType,
00911         SegmentDenovoCopyNumberMultiDataType,
00912         SegmentHemizygousParentOfOriginMultiDataType
00913     };
00914     int nTypes = sizeof(dataTypes) / sizeof(MultiDataType);
00915 
00916     chps.push_back("chrseg1ex");
00917     for (int i=0; i<nTypes; i++)
00918     {
00919         dataTypesV.push_back(dataTypes[i]);
00920         maxNameLn[dataTypes[i]] = 10;
00921     }
00922     writer.Initialize(&chps, dataTypesV, maxNameLn);
00923     int ival=0;
00924     //char buf[10];
00925     for (int itype=0; itype<nTypes; itype++)
00926     {
00927         for (int i=0; i<3+itype; i++)
00928         {
00929                         p.referenceSampleKey = ival++;
00930                         p.familialSampleKey = ival++;
00931             p.chr = ival % 200;
00932             ++ival;
00933             p.call = ival % 200;
00934             ++ival;
00935             p.confidence = ival++;
00936             p.startPosition = ival++;
00937             p.stopPosition = ival++;
00938             p.markerCount = ival++;
00939                         p.homozygosity = ival++;
00940                         p.heterozygosity = ival++;
00941             p.segmentId = ival++;
00942             p.metrics.clear();
00943                 if (dataTypes[itype] == SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType)
00944             {
00945                 param.SetValueInt32(ival++);
00946                 p.metrics.push_back(param);
00947                 param.SetValueFloat(ival++);
00948                 p.metrics.push_back(param);
00949             }
00950             writer.WriteEntry(dataTypes[itype], 0, p);
00951             p.metrics.clear();
00952         }
00953     }
00954     writer.FlushBuffer();
00955 
00956 
00957 
00958         CHPMultiDataData data2;
00959         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
00960         reader.SetFilename("chrseg1ex");
00961         reader.Read(data2);
00962 
00963         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
00964         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00965         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
00966 
00967     ival = 0;
00968     for (int itype=0; itype<nTypes; itype++)
00969     {
00970         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(dataTypes[itype]) == 3+itype);
00971     
00972         if (dataTypes[itype] == SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType)
00973         {
00974             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetMetricColumnName(SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType, 0) == L"int");
00975             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetMetricColumnName(SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType, 1) == L"float");
00976         }
00977         for (int i=0; i<3+itype; i++)
00978         {
00979             data2.GetChromosomeSegmentEntry(dataTypes[itype], i, p);
00980                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.referenceSampleKey == ival++);
00981                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.familialSampleKey == ival++);
00982                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.chr == ival%200);
00983             ++ival;
00984                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.call == ival%200);
00985             ++ival;
00986             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.confidence, ival++, 0.0001f);
00987                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.startPosition == ival++);
00988             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.stopPosition == ival++);
00989             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.markerCount == ival++);
00990                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.homozygosity, ival++, 0.0001f);
00991                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.heterozygosity, ival++, 0.0001f);
00992             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.segmentId == ival++);
00993             if (dataTypes[itype] == SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType)
00994             {
00995                 param = p.metrics[0];
00996                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type);
00997                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueInt32() == ival++);
00998                 param = p.metrics[1];
00999                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType);
01000                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(param.GetValueFloat(), ival++, 0.00001f);
01001             }
01002         }
01003     }
01004 
01005 }

01007 static void CreateChrSegFile(const char *file)
01008 {
01009     std::list<std::wstring> groupNames;
01010     groupNames.push_back(L"g1");
01011     groupNames.push_back(L"g2");
01012 
01013         CHPMultiDataData data(file, &groupNames);
01014 
01015         ParameterNameValueType param;
01016 
01017     vector<ColumnInfo> cols;
01018     IntColumn icol(L"int");
01019     cols.push_back(icol);
01020     FloatColumn fcol(L"float");
01021     cols.push_back(fcol);
01022 
01023         data.SetAlgName(L"sig");
01024         data.SetAlgVersion(L"1.0");
01025         data.SetArrayType(L"test3");
01026 
01027     const MultiDataType dataTypes[] = {
01028         SegmentCNMultiDataType,
01029         SegmentLOHMultiDataType,
01030         SegmentCNNeutralLOHMultiDataType,
01031         SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType,
01032         SegmentMosaicismMultiDataType,
01033         SegmentNoCallMultiDataType
01034     };
01035     int nTypes = sizeof(dataTypes) / sizeof(MultiDataType);
01036 
01037     for (int itype=0; itype<nTypes; itype++)
01038     {
01039         if (dataTypes[itype] == SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType)
01040             data.SetEntryCount(dataTypes[itype], 3+itype, 10, cols, L"g1");
01041         else
01042             data.SetEntryCount(dataTypes[itype], 3+itype, 10, L"g2");
01043     }
01044         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
01045     delete writer;
01046 }
01047 
01048 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::WriteTestChrSegment()
01049 {
01050     CreateChrSegFile("chrseg1");
01051 
01052     affymetrix_calvin_data::ChromosomeSegmentData p;
01053         ParameterNameValueType param;
01054     CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
01055         vector<string> chps;
01056         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypesV;
01057     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLn;
01058 
01059     const MultiDataType dataTypes[] = {
01060         SegmentCNMultiDataType,
01061         SegmentLOHMultiDataType,
01062         SegmentCNNeutralLOHMultiDataType,
01063         SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType,
01064         SegmentMosaicismMultiDataType,
01065         SegmentNoCallMultiDataType
01066     };
01067     int nTypes = sizeof(dataTypes) / sizeof(MultiDataType);
01068 
01069     chps.push_back("chrseg1");
01070     for (int i=0; i<nTypes; i++)
01071     {
01072         dataTypesV.push_back(dataTypes[i]);
01073         maxNameLn[dataTypes[i]] = 10;
01074     }
01075     writer.Initialize(&chps, dataTypesV, maxNameLn);
01076     int ival=0;
01077     //char buf[10];
01078     for (int itype=0; itype<nTypes; itype++)
01079     {
01080         for (int i=0; i<3+itype; i++)
01081         {
01082             p.chr = ival % 200;
01083             ++ival;
01084             p.startPosition = ival++;
01085             p.stopPosition = ival++;
01086             p.markerCount = ival++;
01087                         p.meanMarkerDistance = ival++;
01088             p.segmentId = ival++;
01089             p.metrics.clear();
01090                 if (dataTypes[itype] == SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType)
01091             {
01092                 param.SetValueInt32(ival++);
01093                 p.metrics.push_back(param);
01094                 param.SetValueFloat(ival++);
01095                 p.metrics.push_back(param);
01096             }
01097             writer.WriteEntry(dataTypes[itype], 0, p);
01098             p.metrics.clear();
01099         }
01100     }
01101     writer.FlushBuffer();
01102 
01103 
01104 
01105         CHPMultiDataData data2;
01106         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
01107         reader.SetFilename("chrseg1");
01108         reader.Read(data2);
01109 
01110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
01111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
01112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
01113 
01114     ival = 0;
01115     for (int itype=0; itype<nTypes; itype++)
01116     {
01117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(dataTypes[itype]) == 3+itype);
01118     
01119         if (dataTypes[itype] == SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType)
01120         {
01121             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetMetricColumnName(SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType, 0) == L"int");
01122             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetMetricColumnName(SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType, 1) == L"float");
01123         }
01124         for (int i=0; i<3+itype; i++)
01125         {
01126             data2.GetChromosomeSegmentEntry(dataTypes[itype], i, p);
01127                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.chr == ival%200);
01128             ++ival;
01129                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.startPosition == ival++);
01130             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.stopPosition == ival++);
01131             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.markerCount == ival++);
01132                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.meanMarkerDistance == ival++);
01133             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.segmentId == ival++);
01134             if (dataTypes[itype] == SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType)
01135             {
01136                 param = p.metrics[0];
01137                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type);
01138                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueInt32() == ival++);
01139                 param = p.metrics[1];
01140                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType);
01141                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(param.GetValueFloat(), ival++, 0.00001f);
01142             }
01143         }
01144     }
01145 
01146 }

01148 static void CreateFamilialFile(const char *file)
01149 {
01150     affymetrix_calvin_data::FamilialSample s;
01151     affymetrix_calvin_data::FamilialSegmentOverlap o;
01152 
01153     std::list<std::wstring> groupNames;
01154     groupNames.push_back(L"g1");
01155     groupNames.push_back(L"g2");

01159 
01160         data.SetAlgName(L"sig");
01161         data.SetAlgVersion(L"1.0");
01162         data.SetArrayType(L"test3");
01163 
01164     data.SetEntryCount(FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType, 3, 10, 10, 10, L"g2");
01165     data.SetEntryCount(FamilialSamplesMultiDataType, 3, 10, 10, 10, 10, L"g1");
01166 
01167     CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
01168 /*

01175         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);

01177         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01178             s.chpID = buf;
01179         //wsprintf(wbuf,L"%i",ival++);
01180             s.chpFilename = L"wbuf";
01181         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01182             s.role = buf;
01183         s.roleValidity = (ival%2);
01184         ++ival;
01185             s.roleConfidence = ival++;
01186         writer->WriteEntry(s);
01187     }
01188         writer->SeekToDataSet(FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType);
01189     for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
01190     {
01191         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01192         o.segmentType = buf;
01193         o.referenceSampleKey = ival++;
01194         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);

01197         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);

01202     delete writer;

01204 
01205 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::WriteTestFamilial()
01206 {
01207     CreateFamilialFile("familial1");
01208     CreateFamilialFile("familial2");
01209 
01210     CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
01211         vector<string> chps;
01212         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
01213     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxSegmentTypeLn;
01214     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxReferenceSampleKeyLn;
01215     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxFamilialSegmentIDLn;          
01216     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxFamilialARRIDLn;
01217     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxFamilialCHPIDLn;
01218     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxFamilialCHPFilenameLn;
01219     std::map<MultiDataType, int> maxFamilialRoleLn;
01220 
01221     chps.push_back("familial1");
01222         chps.push_back("familial2");
01223         dataTypes.push_back(FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType);
01224         dataTypes.push_back(FamilialSamplesMultiDataType);
01225 
01226     maxSegmentTypeLn[FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType] = 10;
01227     maxReferenceSampleKeyLn[FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType] = 10;
01228     maxFamilialSegmentIDLn[FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType] = 10;    
01229     maxFamilialARRIDLn[FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType] = 10;
01230     maxFamilialCHPIDLn[FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType] = 10;
01231     maxFamilialCHPFilenameLn[FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType] = 10;
01232     maxFamilialRoleLn[FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType] = 10;
01233 
01234     maxSegmentTypeLn[FamilialSamplesMultiDataType] = 10;
01235     maxReferenceSampleKeyLn[FamilialSamplesMultiDataType] = 10;
01236     maxFamilialSegmentIDLn[FamilialSamplesMultiDataType] = 10;    
01237     maxFamilialARRIDLn[FamilialSamplesMultiDataType] = 10;
01238     maxFamilialCHPIDLn[FamilialSamplesMultiDataType] = 10;
01239     maxFamilialCHPFilenameLn[FamilialSamplesMultiDataType] = 10;
01240     maxFamilialRoleLn[FamilialSamplesMultiDataType] = 10;
01241 
01242     writer.Initialize(&chps, dataTypes, 
01243                     maxSegmentTypeLn,
01244                     maxReferenceSampleKeyLn,
01245                     maxFamilialSegmentIDLn,       
01246                     maxFamilialARRIDLn,
01247                     maxFamilialCHPIDLn,
01248                     maxFamilialCHPFilenameLn,
01249                     maxFamilialRoleLn);
01250 
01251     affymetrix_calvin_data::FamilialSample s;
01252     affymetrix_calvin_data::FamilialSegmentOverlap o;
01253 
01254     char buf[10];
01255     int ival = 0;
01256     for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
01257     {
01258         s.sampleKey = ival++;
01259         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01260             s.arrID = buf;
01261         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01262             s.chpID = buf;
01263         //wsprintf(wbuf,L"%i",ival++);
01264             s.chpFilename = L"wbuf";
01265         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01266             s.role = buf;
01267         s.roleValidity = (ival%2);
01268         ++ival;
01269             s.roleConfidence = ival++;
01270         writer.WriteEntry(FamilialSamplesMultiDataType, 0, s);
01271                 
01272         s.sampleKey = ival++;
01273         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01274             s.arrID = buf;
01275         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01276             s.chpID = buf;
01277         //wsprintf(wbuf,L"%i",ival++);
01278             s.chpFilename = L"wbuf";
01279         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01280             s.role = buf;
01281         s.roleValidity = (ival%2);
01282         ++ival;
01283             s.roleConfidence = ival++;
01284         writer.WriteEntry(FamilialSamplesMultiDataType, 1, s);
01285     }
01286     for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
01287     {
01288         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01289         o.segmentType = buf;
01290         o.referenceSampleKey = ival++;
01291         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01292         o.referenceSegmentID = buf;
01293         o.familialSampleKey = ival++;
01294         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01295         o.familialSegmentID = buf;
01296         writer.WriteEntry(FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType, 0, o);
01297         
01298         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01299         o.segmentType = buf;
01300         o.referenceSampleKey = ival++;
01301         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01302         o.referenceSegmentID = buf;
01303         o.familialSampleKey = ival++;
01304         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01305         o.familialSegmentID = buf;
01306         writer.WriteEntry(FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType, 1, o);
01307     }
01308     writer.FlushBuffer();
01309 
01310         CHPMultiDataData data2;
01311         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
01312         reader.SetFilename("familial1");
01313         reader.Read(data2);
01314 
01315         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
01316         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
01317         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
01318 
01319         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(FamilialSamplesMultiDataType) == 3);
01320         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType) == 3);
01321     
01322     ival = 0;
01323     for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
01324     {
01325         data2.GetFamilialSampleEntry(FamilialSamplesMultiDataType, i, s);
01326         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s.sampleKey == ival++);
01327         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01328             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s.arrID == buf);
01329         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01330             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s.chpID == buf);
01331         //wsprintf(wbuf,L"%i",ival++);
01332             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s.chpFilename == L"wbuf");
01333         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01334             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s.role == buf);
01335         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s.roleValidity == (ival%2 == 0 ? false : true));
01336         ++ival;
01337             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(s.roleConfidence, ival++, 0.0001f);
01338 
01339         ival += 6;
01340     }
01341     for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
01342     {
01343         data2.GetFamilialSegmentOverlapEntry(FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType, i, o);
01344         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01345         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(o.segmentType == buf);
01346         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(o.referenceSampleKey == ival++);
01347         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01348         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(o.referenceSegmentID == buf);
01349         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(o.familialSampleKey == ival++);
01350         sprintf(buf,"%i",ival++);
01351         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(o.familialSegmentID == buf);
01352 
01353         ival += 5;
01354     }
01355 }
01356 
01357 static void CreateAllelePeakFile()
01358 {
01359         ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
01360         ParameterNameValueType param;
01361     affymetrix_calvin_data::AllelePeaks s;
01362 
01363     vector<ColumnInfo> cols;
01364     IntColumn icol(L"int");
01365     cols.push_back(icol);
01366     FloatColumn fcol(L"float");
01367     cols.push_back(fcol);
01368 
01369         CHPMultiDataData data("CHP_MultiData_allele_peaks_buffer");
01370 
01371         data.SetAlgName(L"sig");
01372         data.SetAlgVersion(L"1.0");
01373         data.SetArrayType(L"test3");
01374         data.SetEntryCount(AllelePeaksMultiDataType, 2, 10, cols);
01375 
01376         param.SetName(L"an1");
01377         param.SetValueText(L"av1");
01378         params.push_back(param);
01379         data.AddAlgParams(params);
01380 
01381         params.clear();
01382         param.SetName(L"sn1");
01383         param.SetValueText(L"sv1");
01384         params.push_back(param);
01385         data.AddSummaryParams(params);
01386 
01387 
01388         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
01389         affymetrix_calvin_data::AllelePeaks e;
01390 
01391         writer->SeekToDataSet(AllelePeaksMultiDataType);
01392         e.name = "abc";
01393     e.chr = 0;
01394     e.position = 1;
01395         e.peaks.clear();
01396     param.SetValueInt32(0);
01397     e.peaks.push_back(param);
01398     param.SetValueFloat(0.0f);
01399     e.peaks.push_back(param);
01400         writer->WriteEntry(e);
01401 
01402         e.name = "xyz";
01403     e.chr = 0;
01404     e.position = 0;
01405         e.peaks.clear();
01406     param.SetValueInt32(0);
01407     e.peaks.push_back(param);
01408     param.SetValueFloat(0.0f);
01409     e.peaks.push_back(param);
01410         writer->WriteEntry(e);
01411 
01412         delete writer;
01413 }
01414 
01415 static void UpdateAllelePeakFile()
01416 {
01417         ParameterNameValueType nv;
01418         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
01419         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
01420         dataTypes.push_back(AllelePeaksMultiDataType);
01421         map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLengths;
01422         maxNameLengths[AllelePeaksMultiDataType]=10;
01423         std::vector<std::string> fileNames(1);
01424         fileNames[0] = "CHP_MultiData_allele_peaks_buffer";
01425         writer.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxNameLengths);
01426 
01427         affymetrix_calvin_data::AllelePeaks e;
01428 
01429         nv.SetName(L"int");
01430         nv.SetValueInt32(0);
01431         e.peaks.push_back(nv);
01432         nv.SetName(L"float");
01433         nv.SetValueFloat(0);
01434         e.peaks.push_back(nv);
01435         for (int i=0; i<2; i++)
01436         {
01437                 e.name = IntToString(i);
01438                 e.chr = i+1;
01439                 e.position = i+2;
01440                 e.peaks[0].SetValueInt32(i+3);
01441                 e.peaks[1].SetValueFloat(i+4);
01442                 writer.WriteEntry(AllelePeaksMultiDataType, 0, e);
01443         }
01444         writer.FlushBuffer();
01445 }
01446 
01447 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::WriteTestAllelePeaks()
01448 {
01449         CreateAllelePeakFile();
01450         UpdateAllelePeakFile();
01451 
01452     /////////////////////////////
01453 
01454         ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
01455         ParameterNameValueType param;
01456     affymetrix_calvin_data::AllelePeaks e;
01457 
01458         CHPMultiDataData data2;
01459         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
01460         reader.SetFilename("CHP_MultiData_allele_peaks_buffer");
01461         reader.Read(data2);
01462 
01463         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetNumMetricColumns(AllelePeaksMultiDataType) == 2);
01464     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetMetricColumnName(AllelePeaksMultiDataType, 0) == L"int");
01465     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetMetricColumnName(AllelePeaksMultiDataType, 1) == L"float");
01466 
01467         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
01468         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
01469         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
01470         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(AllelePeaksMultiDataType) == 2);
01471         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType) == 0);
01472         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(ExpressionMultiDataType) == 0);
01473 
01474         ParameterNameValueTypeList p = data2.GetAlgParams();
01475         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it = p.begin();
01476         param = *it;
01477         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"an1");
01478         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"av1");
01479 
01480         p = data2.GetSummaryParams();
01481         it = p.begin();
01482         param = *it;
01483         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"sn1");
01484         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"sv1");
01485 
01486         data2.GetEntry(AllelePeaksMultiDataType, 0, e);
01487         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "0");
01488         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.chr == 1);
01489         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 2);
01490         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.peaks.size() == 2);
01491     param = e.peaks[0];
01492     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type);
01493     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueInt32() == 3);
01494     param = e.peaks[1];
01495     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType);
01496     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(param.GetValueFloat(), 4.0f, 0.00001f);
01497 
01498 
01499         data2.GetEntry(AllelePeaksMultiDataType, 1, e);
01500         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "1");
01501         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.chr == 2);
01502         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 3);
01503         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.peaks.size() == 2);
01504     param = e.peaks[0];
01505     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type);
01506     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueInt32() == 4);
01507     param = e.peaks[1];
01508     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType);
01509     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(param.GetValueFloat(), 5.0f, 0.00001f);
01510 
01511 }

01517 {
01518         ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
01519         ParameterNameValueType param;
01520 
01521     vector<ColumnInfo> cols;
01522     IntColumn icol(L"int");
01523     cols.push_back(icol);
01524     FloatColumn fcol(L"float");
01525     cols.push_back(fcol);
01526 
01527         CHPMultiDataData data("CHP_MultiData_marker_signals_buffer");
01528 
01529         data.SetAlgName(L"sig");
01530         data.SetAlgVersion(L"1.0");
01531         data.SetArrayType(L"test3");
01532         data.SetEntryCount(MarkerABSignalsMultiDataType, 2, 10, cols);
01533 
01534         param.SetName(L"an1");
01535         param.SetValueText(L"av1");
01536         params.push_back(param);
01537         data.AddAlgParams(params);
01538 
01539         params.clear();
01540         param.SetName(L"sn1");
01541         param.SetValueText(L"sv1");
01542         params.push_back(param);
01543         data.AddSummaryParams(params);
01544 
01545 
01546         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
01547         affymetrix_calvin_data::MarkerABSignals e;
01548 
01549         writer->SeekToDataSet(MarkerABSignalsMultiDataType);
01550         e.index = 0;
01551     e.metrics.clear();
01552     param.SetValueInt32(0);
01553     e.metrics.push_back(param);
01554     param.SetValueFloat(0.0f);
01555     e.metrics.push_back(param);
01556         writer->WriteEntry(e);
01557         e.index = 0;
01558     e.metrics.clear();
01559     param.SetValueInt32(0);
01560     e.metrics.push_back(param);
01561     param.SetValueFloat(0.0f);
01562     e.metrics.push_back(param);
01563         writer->WriteEntry(e);
01564 
01565         delete writer;
01566 }

01568 static void UpdateMarkerABSignalFile()
01569 {
01570         ParameterNameValueType nv;
01571         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
01572         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
01573         dataTypes.push_back(MarkerABSignalsMultiDataType);
01574         map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLengths;
01575         maxNameLengths[MarkerABSignalsMultiDataType]=10;
01576         std::vector<std::string> fileNames(1);
01577         fileNames[0] = "CHP_MultiData_marker_signals_buffer";
01578         writer.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxNameLengths);
01579 
01580         affymetrix_calvin_data::MarkerABSignals e;
01581 
01582         nv.SetName(L"int");
01583         nv.SetValueInt32(0);
01584         e.metrics.push_back(nv);
01585         nv.SetName(L"float");
01586         nv.SetValueFloat(0);
01587         e.metrics.push_back(nv);
01588 
01589         for (int i=0; i<2; i++)
01590         {
01591                 e.index = i;
01592                 e.metrics[0].SetValueInt32(i+3);
01593                 e.metrics[1].SetValueFloat(i+4);
01594                 writer.WriteEntry(MarkerABSignalsMultiDataType, 0, e);
01595         }
01596         writer.FlushBuffer();
01597 }

01660 static void CreateCytoGenotypeCallDataFile()
01661 {
01662         ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
01663         ParameterNameValueType param;
01664 
01665     vector<ColumnInfo> cols;
01666     IntColumn icol(L"int");
01667     cols.push_back(icol);
01668     FloatColumn fcol(L"float");
01669     cols.push_back(fcol);
01670 
01671         CHPMultiDataData data("CHP_MultiData_cytogenotype_data_buffer");
01672 
01673         data.SetAlgName(L"sig");
01674         data.SetAlgVersion(L"1.0");
01675         data.SetArrayType(L"test3");
01676         data.SetEntryCount(CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType, 2, 10, cols);
01677 
01678         param.SetName(L"an1");
01679         param.SetValueText(L"av1");
01680         params.push_back(param);
01681         data.AddAlgParams(params);
01682 
01683         params.clear();
01684         param.SetName(L"sn1");
01685         param.SetValueText(L"sv1");
01686         params.push_back(param);
01687         data.AddSummaryParams(params);
01688 
01689 
01690         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(data);
01691         affymetrix_calvin_data::CytoGenotypeCallData e;
01692 
01693         writer->SeekToDataSet(CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType);
01694         e.index = 0;
01695         e.call = 1;
01696         e.aSignal = 1.0f;
01697         e.bSignal = 1.0f;
01698         e.confidence = 1.0f;
01699         e.signalStrength = 1.0f;
01700         e.forcedCall = 1;
01701         e.contrast = 1.0f;
01702 
01703     e.metrics.clear();
01704     param.SetValueInt32(0);
01705     e.metrics.push_back(param);
01706     param.SetValueFloat(0.0f);
01707     e.metrics.push_back(param);
01708         writer->WriteEntry(e);
01709         e.index = 0;
01710     e.metrics.clear();
01711     param.SetValueInt32(0);
01712     e.metrics.push_back(param);
01713     param.SetValueFloat(0.0f);
01714     e.metrics.push_back(param);
01715         writer->WriteEntry(e);
01716 
01717         delete writer;
01718 }
01719 
01720 static void UpdateCytoGenotypeCallDataFile()
01721 {
01722         ParameterNameValueType nv;
01723         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter writer;
01724         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
01725         dataTypes.push_back(CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType);
01726         map<MultiDataType, int> maxNameLengths;
01727         maxNameLengths[CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType]=10;
01728         std::vector<std::string> fileNames(1);
01729         fileNames[0] = "CHP_MultiData_cytogenotype_data_buffer";
01730         writer.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxNameLengths);
01731 
01732         affymetrix_calvin_data::CytoGenotypeCallData e;
01733 
01734         nv.SetName(L"int");
01735         nv.SetValueInt32(4);
01736         e.metrics.push_back(nv);
01737         nv.SetName(L"float");
01738         nv.SetValueFloat(5.0f);
01739         e.metrics.push_back(nv);
01740 
01741         float testFloat = 0.0f;
01742         for (int i=0; i<2; i++)
01743         {
01744                 testFloat++;
01745                 e.index = i;
01746                 e.call = i+1;
01747                 e.forcedCall = i+1;
01748                 e.aSignal = testFloat;
01749                 e.bSignal = testFloat;
01750                 e.confidence = testFloat;
01751                 e.signalStrength = testFloat;
01752                 e.contrast = testFloat;
01753                 e.metrics[0].SetValueInt32(i+3);
01754                 e.metrics[1].SetValueFloat(i+4);
01755                 writer.WriteEntry(CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType, 0, e);
01756         }
01757         writer.FlushBuffer();
01758 
01759 }
01760 
01761 void CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriterTest::WriteTestCytoGenotypeCallData()
01762 {
01763         CreateCytoGenotypeCallDataFile();
01764         UpdateCytoGenotypeCallDataFile();
01765 
01766     /////////////////////////////
01767 
01768         ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
01769         ParameterNameValueType param;
01770     affymetrix_calvin_data::CytoGenotypeCallData e;
01771 
01772         CHPMultiDataData data2;
01773         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
01774         reader.SetFilename("CHP_MultiData_cytogenotype_data_buffer");
01775         reader.Read(data2);
01776 
01777         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
01778         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
01779         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
01780         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType) == 2);
01781         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType) == 0);
01782         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data2.GetEntryCount(ExpressionMultiDataType) == 0);
01783 
01784         ParameterNameValueTypeList p = data2.GetAlgParams();
01785         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it = p.begin();
01786         param = *it;
01787         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"an1");
01788         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"av1");
01789 
01790         p = data2.GetSummaryParams();
01791         it = p.begin();
01792         param = *it;
01793         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"sn1");
01794         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"sv1");
01795 
01796         data2.GetEntry(CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType, 0, e);
01797         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.index == 0);
01798         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 1);
01799         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.confidence == 1);
01800         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.forcedCall == 1);
01801         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.aSignal == 1.0f);
01802         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.bSignal == 1.0f);
01803         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.signalStrength == 1.0f);
01804         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.contrast == 1.0f);
01805         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.metrics.size() == 2);
01806     param = e.metrics[0];
01807     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type);
01808     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueInt32() == 3);
01809     param = e.metrics[1];
01810     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType);
01811     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(param.GetValueFloat(), 4.0f, 0.00001f);
01812 
01813 
01814         data2.GetEntry(CytoGenotypeCallMultiDataType, 1, e);
01815         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.index == 1);
01816         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 2);
01817         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.confidence == 2);
01818         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.forcedCall == 2);
01819         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.aSignal == 2.0f);
01820         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.bSignal == 2.0f);
01821         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.signalStrength == 2.0f);
01822         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.contrast == 2.0f);
01823         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.metrics.size() == 2);
01824     param = e.metrics[0];
01825     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type);
01826     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueInt32() == 4);
01827     param = e.metrics[1];
01828     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType);
01829     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(param.GetValueFloat(), 5.0f, 0.00001f);
01830 
01831 }
